Rate.definition: a fixed ratio between two things 2

1.definition: a fixed ratio between two things

2.definition: a charge, payment, or price fixed according to a ratio, scale, or standard

sub_terms.a: a charge per unit of a commodity provided by a public utility
sub_terms.b: a charge per unit of freight or passenger service see also
sub_terms.c: a unit charge or ratio used in assessing property taxes

3 a.definition: a quantity, amount, or degree of something measured per unit of something else

sub_terms.b: an amount of payment or charge based on another amountthe amount of premium per unit of insurance
